summary: This is an email chain from March 9, 2020, forwarding a message regarding the status of system failures for MCC DVRs, sent from the FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force. It appears to be internal FBI communication about technical issues with recording systems at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The email is forwarded from an individual at the FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force, but the specific name is not provided in the visible text.

events.title: Email regarding MCC DVR system failures
events.description: An email is sent from the FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force regarding the status of system failures for MCC DVRs.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 9, 2020, concerning technical issues with DVR systems at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The communication originates from the FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force.
The subject matter relates to system failures of recording equipment at a federal detention facility.
